subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
organizations: Gleneagles Golf Course at McLaren Park (San Francisco, Calif)
lead_paragraph: The Ryder Cup began Friday at the revered Gleneagles golf resort in Scotland, but San Francisco hosts a distant relative: a city-owned namesake that is a gem in its own way.
snippet: The Ryder Cup began Friday at the revered Gleneagles golf resort in Scotland, but San Francisco hosts a distant relative: a city-owned namesake that is a gem in its own way.
